CustomField.description: The Primary Contact for this Opportunity. If this is an individual Donation, NPSP attributes the Donation to the Primary Contact. If this is an organizational Donation, NPSP attributes a soft credit to the Primary Contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This Primary Contact field on the Opportunity determines who gets the hard credit for that gift. The contact will automatically receive an Opportunity Contact Role = Donor.
CustomField.label: Primary Contact
